snippet: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner and House Speaker John A. Boehner each blamed the other side for the lack of movement toward resolving the fiscal impasse.
lead_paragraph: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner and House Speaker John A. Boehner each blamed the other side for the lack of movement toward resolving the fiscal impasse.

headline.seo: Geithner and Boehner Defend Their Stands on Fiscal Crisis
headline.main: Negotiators Leading Talks on Fiscal Crisis Defend Stands
